message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
You're being too generous, I'll take this offer!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't expect too much!
You're getting desperate, but I'll take a chance!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to give up yet!
You're running out of time, but I'm still not giving in!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you walk all over me!
You're getting desperate, I'm taking control!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're almost out of time, but I'm not going to back down!
I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you take everything!
You're out of time, I'm taking the last crumbs!
